verses.verse: Shiggaion <S%H7692><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he sang <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%> the Benjamite. <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1145><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> in thee do I put my trust: <S%H2620><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> them that persecute <S%H7291><s%> me, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me:
Lest <S%H6435><s%> he tear <S%H2963><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> like a lion, <S%H738><s%> rending it in pieces, <S%H6561><s%> while there is none <S%H369><s%> to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>
O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> this; <S%H2063><s%> if <S%H518><s%> there be <S%H3426><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my hands; <S%H3709><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I have rewarded <S%H1580><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto him that was at peace <S%H7999><s%> with me; (yea, I have delivered <S%H2502><s%> him that without cause <S%H7387><s%> is mine enemy: ) <S%H6887><s%>

Let the enemy <S%H341><s%> persecute <S%H7291><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and take <S%H5381><s%> it; yea, let him tread down <S%H7429><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> upon the earth, <S%H776><s%> and lay <S%H7931><s%> mine honor <S%H3519><s%> in the dust. <S%H6083><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in thine anger, <S%H639><s%> lift up thyself <S%H5375><s%> because of the rage <S%H5678><s%> of mine enemies: <S%H6887><s%> and awake <S%H5782><s%> for <S%H413><s%> me to the judgment <S%H4941><s%> that thou hast commanded. <S%H6680><s%>
So shall the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the people <S%H3816><s%> compass thee about: <S%H5437><s%> for their sakes <S%H5921><s%> therefore return <S%H7725><s%> thou on high. <S%H4791><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> according to my righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and according to mine integrity <S%H8537><s%> that is in <S%H5921><s%> me.

Oh <S%H4994><s%> let the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> come to an end; <S%H1584><s%> but establish <S%H3559><s%> the just: <S%H6662><s%> for the righteous <S%H6662><s%> God <S%H430><s%> trieth <S%H974><s%> the hearts <S%H3820><s%> and reins. <S%H3629><s%>
My defense <S%H4043><s%> is of <S%H5921><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> which saveth <S%H3467><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> judgeth <S%H8199><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and God <S%H410><s%> is angry <S%H2194><s%> with the wicked every <S%H3605><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> he turn <S%H7725><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> he will whet <S%H3913><s%> his sword; <S%H2719><s%> he hath bent <S%H1869><s%> his bow, <S%H7198><s%> and made it ready. <S%H3559><s%>
He hath also prepared <S%H3559><s%> for him the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of death; <S%H4194><s%> he ordaineth <S%H6466><s%> his arrows <S%H2671><s%> against the persecutors. <S%H1814><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he travaileth <S%H2254><s%> with iniquity, <S%H205><s%> and hath conceived <S%H2029><s%> mischief, <S%H5999><s%> and brought forth <S%H3205><s%> falsehood. <S%H8267><s%>
He made <S%H3738><s%> a pit, <S%H953><s%> and digged <S%H2658><s%> it, and is fallen <S%H5307><s%> into the ditch <S%H7845><s%> which he made. <S%H6466><s%>

His mischief <S%H5999><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> upon his own head, <S%H7218><s%> and his violent dealing <S%H2555><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> his own pate. <S%H6936><s%>

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> according to his righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> and will sing praise <S%H2167><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> most high. <S%H5945><s%>
